MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in North Road and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 6:23PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20PM on 20th December 2020
